name: Arrow (itch) (wiljuniorDev)
description:
Arrow is an awesome game about shooting lil triangles. Grind your score and level up!

I'm pretty sure I'm not the only one who hates those silly black triangles (they cringe), so why not to become one and kill 'em >:)

Steve - "Wow, I love killing black [triangles] 😍"

Zofix (actual person) - "I'm bad asf, but shooting smaller triangles makes me feel superior"

Look at this cool menu, I'm not allowed to give my opinion here, but I think it looks pretty sick.

Sarah - "Wow, I love clicking those buttons 🖱"

If you make your computer sad by losing, you cringe.

Bill - "Oh no I'm cringe 😭"

Let's have a look at some gameplay...

That is some high level gameplay, and have you heard that soundtrack yet? Such an experience.

Karol - "Wow, very cool gameplay, I love this game 😎" 


Download now gamers!
